headline: What IDEX (IEX)'s Earnings Beat and Narrowed 2025 Guidance Means For Shareholders
summary: IDEX Corporation recently reported third-quarter 2025 earnings, posting sales of US$878.7 million and net income of US$127.8 million, both up from the previous year, and adjusted earnings surpassing analyst estimates. Alongside the earnings beat, the company narrowed its full-year guidance and disclosed ongoing share buybacks, reflecting a more cautious outlook despite recent operational momentum. We'll examine how IDEX's narrowed 2025 earnings guidance, set against robust quarterly results,...

headline: IDEX Q3 Earnings Surpass Estimates, Sales Increase Year Over Year
summary: IEX's Q3 earnings and revenues top estimates, driven by strong gains in Health & Science Technologies and solid margin growth.

headline: Idex (IEX) Q3 Earnings: Taking a Look at Key Metrics Versus Estimates
summary: While the top- and bottom-line numbers for Idex (IEX) give a sense of how the business performed in the quarter ended September 2025, it could be worth looking at how some of its key metrics compare to Wall Street estimates and year-ago values.

headline: Idex (IEX) Beats Q3 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: Idex (IEX) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +5.18% and +2.37%, respectively, for the quarter ended September 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Idex (IEX) Beats Q3 Earnings and Revenue Estimates

headline: IDEX (NYSE:IEX) Surprises With Q3 Sales
summary: Manufacturing company IDEX (NYSE:IEX) reported revenue ahead of Wall Streets expectations in Q3 CY2025, with sales up 10.1% year on year to $878.7 million. On the other hand, next quarter’s revenue guidance of $871.5 million was less impressive, coming in 2% below analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.03 per share was 5.2% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Idex: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The Northbrook, Illinois-based company said it had net income of $1.70 per share. Earnings, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, were $2.03 per share. The results surpassed Wall Street expectations.

headline: IDEX Reports Third Quarter Results
summary: NORTHBROOK, Ill., October 29, 2025--IDEX Corporation (NYSE: IEX) today announced its financial results for the three-month period ended September 30, 2025.
